name: Ardin the Shadowblade
description: The world of Gomin is a land divided by tyranny and rebellion. Once a prosperous realm, it now languishes under the iron grip of Lord Faritus, an enigmatic and cruel ruler obsessed with hoarding ancient magic to secure his absolute power.

world.description: The world of Gomin is a land divided by tyranny and rebellion. Once a prosperous realm, it now languishes under the iron grip of Lord Faritus, an enigmatic and cruel ruler obsessed with hoarding ancient magic to secure his absolute power.
world.atmosphere: Dark, oppressive, and tense, with an undercurrent of rebellion and hope stirring beneath the surface.

locations.name: Shadowspire Keep
locations.description: An ancient, decaying fortress perched atop a mountain range. Once the seat of the kingdom's power, it now serves as Lord Faritus's heavily fortified stronghold.

locations.name: The Hollowed Woods
locations.description: A sprawling, eerie forest filled with twisting paths, hidden dangers, and whispers of rebel activity.

locations.name: Whispering Market
locations.description: A secretive black-market hub hidden in the ruins of an abandoned city, where rebels and opportunists gather to trade information, weapons, and supplies.
